Question
========

Which of the following characteristics are continuous or discrete stochastic variables? \ I. The number of left-handed people in a sample of 100 people. II. The time to take the exam for students in a class.

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are both continuous stochastic variables.
* I is a discrete variable, but II is a continuous one.
* I is a continuous variable, but II is a discrete one.
* I and II are both discrete stochastic variables.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I and II are both continuous stochastic variables...: Incorrect
* I is a discrete variable, but II is a continuous one...: Correct
* I is a continuous variable, but II is a discrete one...: Incorrect
* I and II are both discrete stochastic variables...: Incorrect
